articles.description: Matt Hancock was seen cuddling up to girlfriend Gina Coladangelo at Capital FM's Jingle Bell Ball and posing for snaps with a former I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! campmate as he continues to revel in his new found reality star fame
articles.content:
Matt Hancock beamed as he enjoyed a lively date night out with girlfriend Gina Coladangelo at Capital FM's Jingle Bell Ball on Saturday. 
The Tory MP cuddled up to Gina as the pair flashed huge smil… [+3442 chars]
